data.name: Lone Planet
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to Lone Planet: start a journey on your lonely planet to discover the birth and fate of the universe. While in search of the meaning of life, live this light RPG adventure playing with unusual physics, in a puzzle platform manner.

The game offers (but is not limited to):
  • Moments of contemplation
  • (Bad) humor
  • Deep lore
  • Easy platform sections
  • Slightly harder platform sections
  • Science references

Everything presented to you through: colorful vector art.
